# {%= name %} {%= badge("fury") %}

> {%= description %}

## Install
{%= include("install") %}

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var omitKeys = require('{%= name %}');
```

Pass a string `key` to omit:

```js
omit({a: 'a', b: 'b', c: 'c'}, 'a')
//=> { b: 'b', c: 'c' }
```

Pass an array of `keys` to omit:

```js
omit({a: 'a', b: 'b', c: 'c'}, ['a', 'c'])
//=> { b: 'b' }
```

Returns the object if no keys are passed:

```js
omit({a: 'a', b: 'b', c: 'c'})
//=> {a: 'a', b: 'b', c: 'c'}
```

Returns an empty object if no value is passed.

```js
omit()
//=> {}
```
